question:
Which among the following took place during the Viceroyship of Lord Dufferin?
1. Indian National Congress was established
2. Third Anglo Burmese war took place
3. The silver jubilee of Queen Victoria was celebrated
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Indian National Congress was established in the year 1885. The third Anglo Burmese war took place in 1885 an annexation of Burma took place in 1886. The silver jubilee of Queen Victoria was celebrated in the year 1887 (16th February).
